function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Existing disease prevention programs disrupted by focus on COVID-19","Impact":"Neglect of other diseases and potential increase in cases","Mitigation":"Allocate resources to manage multiple health issues simultaneously","Technologies":"Healthcare management and allocation software","People":"Patients with other diseases, health workers","Owner":"Health ministries, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Ill-equipped healthcare systems in developing countries","Impact":"Inability to handle multiple public health problems","Mitigation":"Increase funding, provide necessary equipment, and train personnel","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote health monitoring","People":"People in need of healthcare in developing countries","Owner":"International health organizations, NGOs, governments"},{"Description":"Mental health problems overlooked due to social isolation","Impact":"Increased suffering and neglect of mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and awareness programs","Technologies":"Teletherapy, mental health apps","People":"Individuals experiencing social isolation","Owner":"Mental health organizations, governments, communities"}]}
